43741 
by radioman	Thu at 
10:29 PM	35	added BingMapsClientToken, for Customer Identification
WorkItem.Description:
This control is unable to pass a Bing Maps Web Service token through in the url as described here:
http://www.bing.com/toolbox/blogs/maps/archive/2008/04/29/tracking-virtual-earth-tile-usage.aspx

A way to add a specific identifier to the end of the tile URL is all that is needed.  That way a user could add the Bing Maps "token=myToken" when using Bing Maps or add a different key/value pair when using another map provider.

The control is great.  Much easier to use than the MapPoint COM control we were having to embed.

I have modified the source locally to handle this situation and will upload a patch.  Feel free to use the patch or accomplish this another way.
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to pass an authentication token to Bing Maps / MapPoint
